<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform -n </CsOptions> <CsInstruments> ;example by joachim heintz
seed 0
instr 1 ;create an array with 10 elements kArr[] init 10 ;fill in random numbers and print them out kIndx = 0 until kIndx == 10 do kNum random 0, 10 kArr[kIndx] = kNum printf "kArr[%d] = %10f\n", kIndx+1, kIndx, kNum kIndx += 1 od ;calculate sum of all values and print it out kSum sumarray kArr printf "Sum of all values in kArr = %f\n", kIndx+1, kSum turnoff endin </CsInstruments> <CsScore> i1 0 0.1 e </CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
